Entry.JapaneseText: ダナ
Entry.EnglishText: Dana

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ただでさえ肩身が狭いのに 種族が対立し始めて…… 私はどうしたら……
Entry.EnglishText: We were already ashamed as is, and then these racial conflicts started up... What am I to do...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん、私…… 私たち……間違ってませんよね？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... We... We're not wrong, are we?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もう少し、考えてみます。 私たちが、本当にここで 生きていけるのかどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking things over a bit more on whether or not we really want to stay here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もう少し、考えてみます。 私たちが、本当にここで 生きていけるのかどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking things over a bit more on whether or not we really want to stay here...

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸のほうから、イヤな風が 吹いてるような気がします…… とても悪い感じです……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been feeling this unpleasant wind coming from Eastalia... It's truly an awful sensation.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっと決心がつきました。 オックスと二人、この街で がんばってみようと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: Ochs and I have decided that we are going to stay together in this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちが愛し合ってる事が 間違いじゃないって伝えるためにも、 逃げちゃいけないって……
Entry.EnglishText: We can't run away. We have to let others know that it isn't wrong for the two of us to be in love.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマが 愛し合うなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: A Gajuma and Huma in love...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、おかしな事だと お考えでしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: You must think we're crazy.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、誰かを好きになるって 理屈じゃないんです……
Entry.EnglishText: However, falling in love with someone is crazy in itself...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Right, the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... She can't talk to me because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that she can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh...the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, those commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: He isn't allowed to talk to women because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ダナのせんたくカゴ』 たんすに入りきらない服が 限界まで詰め込まれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Dana's Laundry Basket - It's crammed with clothes that wouldn't fit in the dresser.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『蒼獣様の教え（壁の張り紙）』 一．男女が外で言葉を交わすべからず。 二．女は家族以外に素顔を見せるべからず。 三．青く澄んだ水は聖なるものとすべし。 四．毎日必ず風呂に入り体を清めるべし。 五．早寝早起き七転び八起きすべし。 ……など、あれこれ書かれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- The Azure Beast's Commandments (Poster) - 1) Men and women must not converse in public. 2) A woman should not show her bare face to anyone outside of her family. 3) Clear blue waters should be considered sacred. 4) One must purify their own body daily. 5) One must rise and rest early every day. ...And the like are written on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ダナのたんす』 詰め込みすぎ。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Dana's Dresser - It's crammed full of things.
